name: Colour Wheel Of Fun-Level 1
description:
This is a simple game for all types of people if you think you are the best then tyr it. The level 2 will be coming shortly in another game or update.

Instructions:

To play this game using touch enabled device:(tap on your screen)

To play it on a non touch enabled device click buttons of your mouse or play it by pressing space button again and again.

Caution

After starting the game immediately tap the specified button on screen or else the game will restart and you will lose

Enjoy playing It.......
